com.ecs.utils.stellent.embedded
Class FWDocument

java.lang.Object
  com.ecs.utils.stellent.embedded.FWDocument
public class FWDocument
extends java.lang.Object

The FWDocument provides a feather-weight (and very restricted) mechanism for working with documents in a Stellent Content Server. It can only be populated if a intradoc.data.Workspace context exists so should only be called when running within the SCS. It provides a streamlined mechanism for accessing the metadata on a Stellent content item. You cannot use this object to retrieve the object content or update its metadata. For these you should use the LWDocument.

Author:
gs
